languages.text: "Священные отступники от истинного облика Человека. Так странно понимать, что Неумирающий даровал привилегии неприкосновенности подобным... слугам Его".
languages.translation_comment: Heinrix: "The Navis Nobilite is a unique part of the Imperium's apparatus. The privileged position Navigators occupy enables them to carry out questionable acts, which they hide behind the walls of their fortresses."

languages.text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."
languages.original_text: "Священные отступники от истинного облика Человека. Так странно понимать, что Неумирающий даровал привилегии неприкосновенности подобным... слугам Его".

traits.locale_text: "Blessed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Blessed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Geheiligte Apostate aus der wahren Gestalt der Menschheit. Wie absonderlich, dass der Todlose das Privileg der Heiligkeit solchen ... Dienern gewährt hat."
languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: "Geheiligte Apostate aus der wahren Gestalt der Menschheit. Wie absonderlich, dass der Todlose das Privileg der Heiligkeit solchen ... Dienern gewährt hat."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Des apostats sanctifiés en rupture avec la vraie nature de l'humanité. Je m'étonne que l'Immortel ait accordé le privilège de la sainteté à de tels... serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: « Des apostats sanctifiés en rupture avec la vraie nature de l'humanité. Je m'étonne que l'Immortel ait accordé le privilège de la sainteté à de tels... serviteurs. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Apóstatas sagrados de la forma verdadera de la Humanidad. Resulta extraño pensar que el Inmortal ha otorgado el privilegio de la santidad a semejantes... sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: «Apóstatas sagrados de la forma verdadera de la Humanidad. Resulta extraño pensar que el Inmortal ha otorgado el privilegio de la santidad a semejantes... sirvientes».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「人の真の姿の背教者たちよ。不死の者がこのような…下僕にサンクティティの特権をお与えになるとは…とても不思議だ」
languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: 「人の真の姿の背教者たちよ。不死の者がこのような…下僕にサンクティティの特権をお与えになるとは…とても不思議だ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “这些神圣之人舍弃了人类的形态。这实在是非常古怪，不死之神会将神圣的权利赐予像这样的……仆人。”
languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."

traits.locale_text: “这些神圣之人舍弃了人类的形态。这实在是非常古怪，不死之神会将神圣的权利赐予像这样的……仆人。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hallowed apostates from Humanity's true form. It is so strange to know that the Undying One has granted the privilege of sanctity to such... servants."
